responses.title: I sense the proximity of souls...
Ozh icha gluth izh sol. (I will eat your soul.)
It's the perfect time to start a new collection!

name: Using Presence of the Dark Lord

responses.title: First soul swimming in First Blood sauce!
First Soul is more my sort of thing.
I'll take that soul if you're not using it.
Another soul? Don't mind if I do.
I'll see you in the Abysm.
A beautiful soul for my collection.
Your tormented soul will shine in my collection.
I had marked your soul for collection when you were but a wisp of evil.
Ozh vo’wroth thok omoz, Lucifash. (I will never return to your pit, Lucifer.)
I'll keep your soul where light cannot defile it.
Your shadow soul's within my grasp.
Demon, your shadow is cheerily bright, compared to my uttermost absence of light.
Sav omoz acha Ozh! (Seventh hell is mine!)
Ozh ahm’poz arkosh. (I am more powerful than the master!)
Vo’hadoq greesh. Sol icha Ozh! (Keep your debt. The souls are mine!)
Ozh acha vo’izh. (I am yours no longer!)
Ha ha ha ha ha. A Soul Keeper for my Keep of Souls.
Soul Keeper? Say rather, Soul Keepsake!
I guess gingers do have souls. Mm, delicious.
It's true, I have the soul of a poet. I just can't remember where I put it.
So, you're curious where I come from? There's one easy way to find out for yourself.
I've been saving up for this.
I thought this hour would never come.
Been saving all those pennies off the dead men's eyes...
The eyes of the soul never blink.
Ha ha ha ha ha! Immortality!
Ha ha ha ha ha! To die...Nevermore!
Hahaha! I'll never give you the satisfaction.
I'll never give you the satisfaction.
I'll leave you a couple pennies for your eyes.
Never has there been such a day!
All this has been for nothing?
There has never been such a victory!
A victory never to be forgotten!
Such haste is unseemly...but I'll take it.
You'll never know which is which.
I have more room in my collection.

name: Attempting to Use an Ability on Cooldown
Attempting to Use an Ability without Mana

responses.title: I thank you from the bottom of my souls.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
Mm ah ha ha ha ha!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
